metadata.title: CVE-2020-6570 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Information leakage in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 85.0.4183.83allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information via acrafted WebRTC interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
